TopicTitle: Not really a newbie, but a returning member. Hello hello there!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, everyone who doesn't know and still knows me!

I apologize for becoming inactive all of a sudden (my last post was 2 months ago), and now I don't have any idea what's going on here.

After playing Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion for countless hours (experimenting new class builds, mastering everything, clearing the game multiple times without any mods, fighting Mankar Camoran like 'twas nothing, and uploading countless videos of them even when I'm already 6 or 7 years late), XIII (that FPS from 2002 with a comic-ish feeling on it, owning bots in deathmatches and uploading them), SNES Emulator (Gradius, Top Gear, Doctor Mario; because nostalgia), DS Emulator (Pokemon Platinum to be exact, already clocked more than 100 hours before stopping all of a sudden) and Pokemon Vortex (an online Pokemon MMORPG site reminiscent of Pokemon Crater), now I'm back here for no reason (actually Danny2462's videos suddenly came into my mind and went to check them, finding out that 0.23 has been released, and it looks more interesting than ever).

The last version I have played was 0.19. I haven't got 0.20 and 0.21 last November.

So now I'm back here again, though still less active than before (and I know it's now impossible to reclaim the fame/reputation that I had 2 years ago, if there's any). I don't know if I still know how to play, either. Thinking of starting another KSP series ([NS] was a partial failure if you ask me) and this time probably pushing through for my commentary (it's not that late yet, I guess?).

Oh, and I'm actually quite surprised that my challenge was still going on despite my inactivity for the past few months (with latest entry submitted 2 days ago by the time of posting)

PS: I still haven't managed to launch a spaceplane into orbit and land them in one piece.

Welcome back, though isn't this the second time?

Anyway it's good to see you posting again, KSP hasn't changed that much, but if you have any questions feel free to ask here or in the Gameplay section.

Fly safe!
Welcome back. I vaguely do remember you from before.

Welcome back, Flixxbeatz.
Welcome back. I vaguely do remember you from before.

Thanks guys

Welcome back, though isn't this the second time?

Anyway it's good to see you posting again, KSP hasn't changed that much, but if you have any questions feel free to ask here or in the Gameplay section.

Fly safe!

I can't remember actually, everything happened all of a sudden
Hello again! This game is still fun, though that isn't too surprising
